message.content:
cs.CR, cs.PL, cs.GT, cs.DC, cs.SE 

The paper discusses the security and correctness of smart contracts, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also presents a new framework for quantitative analysis of smart contracts, which involves modeling game-theoretic aspects and utilities, and requires programming language research (cs.PL) and game theory research (cs.GT). The paper also discusses the challenges of stateful analysis, which falls under the category of distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC) and software engineering (cs.SE).
